data.text: O God, gumazir kuraba na gasɨghasɨghasava ami,
Gumazir kuraba modogha uari akuvagha na mɨsogh na gasɨghasɨghasa akabav sosi.
Me mɨgeir mɨgɨrɨgɨaba bar ghumigha mɨdorozir sabamɨn mɨn nan mɨkarzim aghori.
Me gumaziba bagh azuazim aguaraghtɨ a men suighasa me uariv gei.
Me arazir kurabar amuasa akam mɨsuegha gɨvagha ghaze,
Me kamaghɨn damutɨ God uan barimɨn me gaseghtɨ,
